experience.role: Working Student - Vehicle Integration & Noise Reduction
points: Conducting comprehensive collision analyses on full vehicle assemblies using CATIA, ensuring compliance with functional and design requirements.
Contributing to the development of a machine learning-based clash detection system by generating controlled clash scenarios for training and validation.
Refining contact analysis process ensure accurate representation of relevant clashes in the analysis, minimizing false positives and improving system reliability.
Completed a 90-day training course on geometry editing, meshing, and analysis in ANSYS.
Applied Finite Element Analysis (FEA) techniques using ANSYS software to address a real-world engineering problem involving a rack and pinion assembly.

Conducted an FEA analysis which identified that Nickel Aluminum Bronze alloy demonstrates superior strength and performance, contributing to optimizing the design and resulting in a 20% increase in structural integrity.

experience.company: JK LAKSHMI CEMENT & POWER PLANT, Pindwara, India
points: Acquired in-depth knowledge of various machines and equipment in cement production and power plants.
Worked closely with engineering team to understand maintenance strategies and utilized data-driven insights from IBM Maximo.
Created a detailed report using SolidWorks and MS Office to analyze and document machinery, maintenance practices, and operating procedures.

experience.role: Internship as a mechanical design engineer
points: Gained in-depth knowledge of transformer design and optimization using SolidWorks and Fusion 360, including structural analysis using FEM.
Involved in thermal analysis and evaluation of insulating fluids, resulting in a 1.3% improvement in transformer performance.
Collaborated with a team of engineers, focusing on achieving an 8% increase in heat dissipation through innovative cooler designs.

education.institution: Rosenheim Technical University of Applied Sciences, Rosenheim, Germany
Vellore Institute of Technology, Vellore - India
education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Mechanical Engineering
education.details: Average grade: 1,7. Bachelor thesis: Nonlinear transient response of viscoelastic sandwich panels with composite laminates face sheets (grade 1.0)

academic_projects.title: Master Project: Additive Manufacturing of LBM Parts
points: Conducted simulations and manufactured LBM components using Siemens NX for CAM programming and vibration analysis.
Optimized tool paths and reduced vibrations during machining of 316L stainless steel using customized clamping fixtures.
Analyzed surface quality and improved tool lifespan through detailed vibration control and advanced machining strategies.

academic_projects.title: Academic Project: CNC Milling of a Topology
points: Strategically applied hybrid rib roughing and 3D constant step processes to generate tool paths that enabled accurate and efficient milling of the workpiece while minimizing machining time to under 60 minutes.
Developed a 3D printed prototype of the topology to analyze the CAD geometry and optimized the CNC program for precise and efficient results.
